title: Registration System
description: A simple customer registration system using Laravel framework. It includes user Registration, Temporary Delete, Restore, Search and Delete functionality.

title: Instagram Clone
description: Instagram Clone using Laravel framework. It includes Login, Signup, Logout, Posting Images and Comments, Delete posts and Modification of the Profile functionality.

title: Twitter Clone
description: I developed a Twitter clone as part of my web development projects to demonstrate my skills in front-end design and implementation.

title: Solo-Tech
description: Fully functional webiste for Tech Company using MernStack. There are multiple of features like Login, Register, Logout and many others related to any tech company.

title: Code Analysis
description: Analyzing the Relations and finding the Runtime using Master, Extended Master and Muster Theorems.

title: HTML Checker
description: JavaScript Checker using HTML, CSS, JavaScript. This is mainly done by making the regular expressions of JavaScript.

title: Car ShowRoom
description: Car Showroom using python and tkinter package. You can buy car and rent the car in this project.
